profile:
At Modern PURAIR速 we have developed an exclusive PURCURx速 Contact Cleaning Scrub System that actually scrubs all 4 sides of your duct system eliminating dirt, dust and debris built up in your home or businesses air duct system. By using this trademarked, innovative cutting edge method, we are able to successfully remove the maximum amount of dust and dirt deposits and by doing so we will warrant our work with a full 30 day satisfaction guarantee.

We are Canadas only nationally branded Indoor Air Quality experts and are the largest providers in the nation. Because of our commitment to being the industries best we have developed several trademarked and patent pending services that separate us from the competition. As a result, we have won several industry recognized awards for our Go Green technology and superior cleaning ability.

At Modern PURAIR速 we take pride that all of our technicians are fully licensed, insured, and bonded for your absolute peace of mind.

Other services we provide are Dryer vent cleaning, Heat pump cleaning, Indoor Air Quality Testing, and Filter Maintenance.

We Service West Vancouver, North Vancouver, Vancouver, Burnaby, Coquitlam, Richmond, Tsawwassen, Delta, Surrey, White Rock, Langley, Port Coquitlam, Port Moody, Pitt Meadows, Maple Ridge, Mission, Abbotsford, Chilliwack, Hope, Whistler
